thread.title_full: IPConfigure Announces UNLIMITED Camera Pricing for Enterpise VMS

author: Peachy Carnehan
title: IPConfigure Announces UNLIMITED Camera Pricing for Enterpise VMS
text:
IPConfigure is excited to bring an UNLIMITED camera pricing model to the mid and enterprise video surveillance markets. IPConfigure's flagship VMS, Enterprise Surveillance Manager (ESM), delivers the capabilities required to effectively operate and manage multi-location IP video surveillance systems while removing the incremental license pricing model. ESM Unlimited is priced at $32,000 MSRP and includes support for unlimited cameras, servers, locations, users, and client sessions while protected by a 3-year support and upgrade agreement. Enterprise Surveillance Manager is an enterprise-class video surveillance management and recording platform designed to operate with commercial off-the-shelf IP cameras, servers, switches, and storage. Through a common browser interface ESM natively supports Windows, OS X, iOS, and Android operating systems, allowing users and administrators to access ESM from any network computer while removing the need to install, manage, and license client software.
In addition to map navigation, thumbnail search, synchronized multi-camera playback, license plate recognition, and alarm monitoring, ESM offers advanced administrative features like Active Directory authentication, video storage motion grooming, and system reporting through a unified platform built for the enterprise.
For customers looking for pre-configured solutions, IPConfigure offers SteelFin, a range of surveillance appliances and servers. SteelFin Servers are backed by redundant power supplies, mirrored OS disk volume on select models, RAID 5 or 6 storage volumes, and now a spare hard drive, ensuring your surveillance system maintains the highest possible uptime. Available in a multitude of form-factors and offering usable storage ranging from 1 TB to 96 TB, SteelFin Servers are tailored to offer you a compatible and customized solution that is optimized for your video surveillance environment and include up to a 3-year warranty.
IPConfigure products are available through Anixter, CSC, GrayBar, Ingram Micro, and ScanSource distributors.
About IPConfigure, Inc.
Founded in 2003 and headquartered in Norfolk, Virginia, IPConfigure, Inc. is a privately held software company. A leading developer of IP video surveillance solutions, IPConfigure offers a variety of products - all of which leverage a browser interface and are capable of seamlessly supporting unlimited cameras, locations and users in a centralized or distributed architecture. IPConfigure has successfully deployed ESM to a broad range of customers including Fortune 500 companies, Federal law enforcement agencies, and global retailers.
